title.rendered: How do I deactivate my listing?

content.rendered:
Deactivating your listing will take it out of the search results while giving you the option to re-activate it at a later time. As soon as the listing is deactivated you will need a listing credit in order to reactivate it.

When you reactivate your listing you will need to wait for our Listings Team to re-approve it.Web

  • Login to your Roomi account from our homepage and click My Listings from the menu
  • Click the X icon to the right of your listing
  • Click Confirm

iOS

You must be in Lister Mode to deactivate your listing on

  • Tap on More from the menu at the bottom
  • Tap My Listings from the slide out menu
  • Tap the X icon in the right corner of your listing photo
  • Tap Deactivate My Listing

Android

You must be in Lister Mode to deactivate your listing on

  • Tap the menu icon in the top-left hand corner (the icon represents three small lines stacked vertically)
  • Tap My Listings from the slide out menu
  • Tap the X icon in the right corner of your listing
  • Tap Deactivate

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Web Please note: Your listing must be deactivated before it can be deleted. jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We offer the option to boost your listing if you need to fill your room quickly.
